sentences.english: Kim and Tong had pleaded guilty to the charges at their trial, Yonhap said.
sentences.chinese: 金及童已承认其在审判的指控，韩国联合通讯社说。

sentences.english: A transcript of the documents, assembled by congressional investigators and reviewed by Dow Jones Newswires, indicates Mr.
sentences.chinese: 道琼斯通讯社看过国会调查人员整理的文件副本。

sentences.english: Once only wire-service journalists had their output measured this way.
sentences.chinese: 以前通讯社记者是这样衡量他们的输出的。

sentences.english: Reuters news agency reported large numbers of arrests.
sentences.chinese: 路透社通讯社报道大量的逮捕行动。

sentences.english: Allow me to introduce myself. I am Satoshi Ishikawa, president of Kyodo News from Japan.
sentences.chinese: 我是日本共同通讯社社长石川聪。

sentences.english: A man was arrested at the scene, according to the Ansa news agency.
sentences.chinese: 据安莎通讯社报道，一名人员当场被逮捕。

sentences.english: Jordan's official newsagency said at least three of its soldiers were killed.
sentences.chinese: 约旦官方通讯社称，至少三名本国士兵丧生。

sentences.english: They even set up their own news agency to peddle anti-isolationist propaganda .
sentences.chinese: 他们甚至设立了自己的通讯社来宣扬反孤立主义。

sentences.english: But had not thought that actually has encountered Korean Central News Agency rare refuting .
sentences.chinese: 但没想到，却遭到了朝鲜中央通讯社罕见的驳斥。

sentences.english: The news is said to be given by that very influential news agency.
sentences.chinese: 此消息据言来自那家极有影响的通讯社。
